# preferFastIntersection

**Type Property**

An option that instructs Metal to prioritize building an acceleration structure with better intersection performance.

## Declaration

```swift
static var preferFastIntersection: MTLAccelerationStructureUsage { get }
```

## Discussion

The acceleration structures you build with this option can increase their build times.

## Applying options

- **refit**: An option that lets you update an acceleration structure after creating it.
- **preferFastBuild**: An option that instructs Metal to build an acceleration structure quickly.
- **minimizeMemory**: An option that instructs Metal to prioritize building an acceleration structure that needs less memory.
- **extendedLimits**: An option that increases an acceleration structure’s storage capacity.
